page: AE31006: Computer Application In Aero. Engineering

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Numerical solutions of linear and non-linear algebraic equations, ordinary differential equations and partial differential equations; conceptual data models, methods of organizing, storing and retrieving data, data structures; Elements of modern artificial intelligence (AI) related techniques; introduction to Genetic Algorithms and Artificial Neural Nets; Examples related to Aerospace Engineering.
page: AE31006: Computer Application In Aero. Engineering
